verses.text: \w The|strong="H3588"\w* psalm \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* anointed. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* light \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation, whom \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* fear? \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* protector \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life: \w of|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* afraid?

Whilst \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wicked draw near against \w me|strong="H0974"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w my|strong="H3068"\w* flesh. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w that|strong="H3068"\w* trouble \w me|strong="H0974"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* themselves \w been|strong="H3068"\w* weakened, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* fallen.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* armies \w in|strong="H1980"\w* camp \w should|strong="H1980"\w* stand together \w against|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H5048"\w*, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* heart shall \w not|strong="H3588"\w* fear. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* battle \w should|strong="H1980"\w* rise \w up|strong="H5048"\w* \w against|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H5048"\w*, \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* confident.

\w One|strong="H3808"\w* thing \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* asked \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* Lord, \w this|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H3808"\w* after; \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* house \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* Lord all \w the|strong="H0935"\w* days \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* life. \w That|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* delight \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w visit|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* temple.

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath hidden \w me|strong="H8130"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* tabernacle; \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* day \w of|strong="H3427"\w* evils, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath protected \w me|strong="H8130"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* secret place \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* tabernacle.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* hath exalted \w me|strong="H5437"\w* upon \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rock: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* now \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath lifted \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head above \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* gone \w round|strong="H5437"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* offered \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* tabernacle \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sacrifice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* jubilation: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* recite \w a|strong="H3068"\w* psalm \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* Lord, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w with|strong="H3605"\w* which \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* cried \w to|strong="H8085"\w* thee: \w have|strong="H3605"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* heart hath said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee: \w My|strong="H3068"\w* face hath sought thee: thy face, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* still seek.

Turn \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w away|strong="H0622"\w* thy face \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*; decline \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* thy wrath \w from|strong="H0376"\w* thy servant. \w Be|strong="H0408"\w* thou \w my|strong="H0622"\w* helper, forsake \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*; \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thou despise \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* God \w my|strong="H0622"\w* Saviour.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* father \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* mother \w have|strong="H0834"\w* left \w me|strong="H0834"\w*: \w but|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w* hath taken \w me|strong="H0834"\w* up.

Set \w me|strong="H0589"\w*, \w O|strong="H0589"\w* Lord, a law in thy \w way|strong="H6299"\w*, \w and|strong="H8537"\w* guide \w me|strong="H0589"\w* in \w the|strong="H0589"\w* right path, because \w of|strong="H8537"\w* \w my|strong="H6299"\w* enemies.

Deliver \w me|strong="H1288"\w* not \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* trouble \w me|strong="H1288"\w*; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* unjust witnesses \w have|strong="H3068"\w* risen \w up|strong="H5975"\w* against \w me|strong="H1288"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity hath lied \w to|strong="H3068"\w* itself.
I believe to see the good things of the Lord in the land of the living.
Expect the Lord, do manfully, and let thy heart take courage, and wait thou for the Lord.
